rules_text:
{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes doesn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}{GW}{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes has a +1/+1 counter on it and doesn't have vigilance, put two +1/+1 counters and a vigilance counter on it.
{3}{GW}{GW}{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes has vigilance and not indestructible, put four +1/+1 counters and an indestructible counter on it.
